title: Classic Crystal - Wikipedia
cleaned_text: Classic [Miss the Mississippi](/wiki/Miss_the_Mississippi) (1979) Classic Crystal is the second compilation album by American [country music](/wiki/Country_music) singer [Crystal Gayle](/wiki/Crystal_Gayle). Released in October 1979, the album spans Gayle's time on the [United Artists Records](/wiki/United_Artists_Records) label, which proved to be the height of her career. It peaked at #8 on the Billboard Country Music Albums chart, and #62 on the Billboard 200. It was certified [Gold](/wiki/Gold_record) by the [RIAA](/wiki/RIAA) in 1980. In the [United Kingdom](/wiki/United_Kingdom), a 14 track modified version of the album was released in 1980 as The Crystal Gayle Singles Album. It included the recent UK singles 'We Should Be Together' and 'Too Deep For as 'High and 'All I Wanna Do In Life'. 'I'll Do It All Over Again' was omitted.
